body:
Comment 8: 
This is a bigger job than it would seem.

The general problem is that the line number of the places where an ONAME is used isn't
recorded anywhere. If this is added, this and a couple of similar issues would go away
(cannot remember the issue numbers off the top of my head). However, the ONAME node is
used everywhere throughout the toolchain, so it isn't a trivial task. Besides, all this
extra information might bloat the AST.
